access.description: Access type for the published package

dryRun.description: Whether or not to run all mutative operations as dry runs

registryCredentials.description: Login credentials for the local registry

username.description: Username for logging into the local registry

password.description: Password for logging into the local registry

email.description: Email for logging into the local registry

registryUrl.description: Full URL of the local registry to publish packages to

packagePath.description: Path to the built package to publish

skipLogin.description: Whether or not to skip logging into the registry

skipUnpublish.description: Whether or not to skip unpublishing from the registry before publishing
